AnalysisConcept.description: Statistical analysis pattern specification. Represents a reusable analysis concept that can be instantiated in specific studies. Contains statistical semantics including required inputs, expected outputs, and analysis methods.

allowedDataConcepts.description: Derivation concepts compatible with this analysis

requiredAnalysisConcepts.description: Analysis concepts required by this analysis

requiredBiomedicalConcepts.description: Biomedical concepts required by this analysis

requiredBuildingBlocks.description: Building blocks needed for sentence composition

requiredDerivationConcepts.description: Derivation concepts required by this analysis

AnalysisConcept.title: AnalysisConcept

AnalysisConceptReference.description: Reference to an analysis concept with semantic role.
AnalysisConceptReference.title: AnalysisConceptReference

BiomedicalConcept.description: Clinical semantic concept representing biomedical domain knowledge. Defines abstract clinical semantics without implementation mappings. Related to SDTM and ADaM variables through implementsConcept relationships in study instances.
BiomedicalConcept.title: BiomedicalConcept

BiomedicalConceptReference.description: Reference to a biomedical concept with semantic role.
BiomedicalConceptReference.title: BiomedicalConceptReference

BuildingBlock.description: Reusable phrase template for analysis sentence composition. Represents a template with parameter placeholders that can be filled during Step 1 of the workflow to compose human-readable analysis sentences.

mapsToDataConcept.description: Derivation concepts required by this phrase

requiresAnalysisConcept.description: Analysis concepts that can use this building block

BuildingBlock.title: BuildingBlock

BuildingBlockReference.description: Reference to a building block with semantic role and parameter mappings. Used by AnalysisConcept to declare which building blocks are needed for sentence composition.

parameterMappings.description: Mappings between building block parameters and concept inputs/outputs

BuildingBlockReference.title: BuildingBlockReference

CodelistReference.description: Reference to a controlled terminology codelist.
CodelistReference.title: CodelistReference

ConceptInput.description: Input specification for analysis or data concepts. Defines what data or information is required as input to an analysis or data derivation.

implementsConcept.description: Reference to DerivationConcept(s) or BiomedicalConcept(s) that this element implements

ConceptInput.title: ConceptInput

ConceptLibrary.description: Root container for a library of reified concepts. Can contain any combination of AnalysisConcepts, DerivationConcepts, BuildingBlocks, BiomedicalConcepts, and Methods.
ConceptLibrary.title: ConceptLibrary

ConceptOutput.description: Output specification for analysis or data concepts. Defines what results or derived values are produced by an analysis or data derivation.
ConceptOutput.title: ConceptOutput

DataTypeEnum.description: Standard data types for variables and parameters
DataTypeEnum.title: DataTypeEnum

DerivationConcept.description: Abstract data semantic specification. Represents a reusable derivation concept that can be implemented by study-specific variables. Contains data semantics including data type, ADaM class, and optional derivation specifications. Also called DataConcept.

mapsToVariable.description: SDTM/ADaM variable names implementing this concept

requiredBiomedicalConcepts.description: Biomedical concepts required by this analysis

requiredDerivationConcepts.description: Derivation concepts required by this analysis

DerivationConcept.title: DerivationConcept

DerivationConceptReference.description: Reference to a derivation concept with semantic role.
DerivationConceptReference.title: DerivationConceptReference

DerivationMethod.description: Lightweight formula-based derivation method. Used by DerivationConcept when the concept represents a derived value computed via mathematical formula (e.g., CHG = AVAL - BASE).
DerivationMethod.title: DerivationMethod

MappingTypeEnum.description: Type of parameter mapping between building blocks and concepts
MappingTypeEnum.title: MappingTypeEnum

MethodCategoryEnum.description: Categories of statistical and derivation methods
MethodCategoryEnum.title: MethodCategoryEnum

MethodImplementation.description: Implementation of a method in a specific programming language.
MethodImplementation.title: MethodImplementation

MethodReference.description: Reference to a statistical method with semantic role.
MethodReference.title: MethodReference

ParameterMapping.description: Bidirectional mapping between building block parameters and concept inputs/outputs. A building block parameter can either provide an input to the concept OR describe an output from the concept.

buildingBlockParameter.description: Name of parameter in building block template

mapsToInput.description: OID of ConceptInput this parameter provides

mapsToOutput.description: OID of ConceptOutput this parameter describes

ParameterMapping.title: ParameterMapping

StatisticalMethod.description: Statistical analysis method specification. Includes formal mathematical specification and multi-language implementations for complex statistical analyses like ANCOVA, t-tests, regression models, etc.
StatisticalMethod.title: StatisticalMethod

TemplateParameter.description: Parameter definition for building block templates. Defines a placeholder in a phrase template that must be filled during sentence composition.
TemplateParameter.title: TemplateParameter

description: Root container for a library of reified concepts. Can contain any combination of AnalysisConcepts, DerivationConcepts, BuildingBlocks, BiomedicalConcepts, and Methods.
title: define-json-analysis-concepts
